version_description:
Hi everyone! This update delivers the following improvements:
* New vehicle: "Shuriken" superbike
* New level: "Hit the Fan" demonstrating the perils of renewables
* New seasonal heads for Shamrock and Summer seasons
* Turbo Dismount is now enhanced by Metal (on supported devices)
* Everyplay updated

Hi everyone! This update delivers the following improvements:
* New vehicle: "Shuriken" superbike
* New level: "Hit the Fan" demonstrating the perils of renewables
* New seasonal heads for Shamrock and Summer seasons
* Turbo Dismount is now enhanced by Metal (on supported devices)
* Everyplay updated

It's Speed Season!
* New vehicle: Squealer - unlocked with any purchase!
* Helmet head available during Speed Season
* Free fly camera mode available when a controller is connected
* Fixes to existing vehicles
* Updated Everyplay
* Other minor fixes and tweaks

It's Speed Season!
* New vehicle: Squealer - unlocked with any purchase!
* Helmet head available during Speed Season
* Free fly camera mode available when a controller is connected
* Fixes to existing vehicles
* Updated Everyplay
* Other minor fixes and tweaks

It's Survival Season!
* New vehicle: Wastelander dune buggy - unlocked with any purchase!
* Seasonal head for survival season!
* Vehicle engine dynamics and sound system improved. You may notice a slightly different vehicle behavior.
* Manual steering improved. It’s now more possible than ever!

It's Survival Season!
* New vehicle: Wastelander dune buggy - unlocked with any purchase!
* Seasonal head for survival season!
* Vehicle engine dynamics and sound system improved. You may notice a slightly different vehicle behavior.
* Manual steering improved. It’s now more possible than ever!

It's Future Season!
It's getting close to October 21st 2015. We're celebrating this important temporal fact with:
* New vehicle: LeDorean - free with any purchase!
* Seasonal head: Meat Tenderizer Helmet!

It's Future Season!
It's getting close to October 21st 2015. We're celebrating this important temporal fact with:
* New vehicle: LeDorean - free with any purchase!
* Seasonal head: Meat Tenderizer Helmet!

It's Offroad Season!
* New vehicle: Tumbler Quad-bike - free with any purchase!
* Seasonal head: Dirt Bike Helmet!
* Added support for iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus and iPad Pro

It's Offroad Season!
* New vehicle: Tumbler Quad-bike - free with any purchase!
* Seasonal head: Dirt Bike Helmet!
* Added support for iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus and iPad Pro

Ho ho ho, it's Holiday Season!
* New level: Figure Scraping!

Ho ho ho, it's Holiday Season!
* New level: Figure Scraping!

It's GALACTIC Season!
* New vehicle: "Quad-Fin Fighter" - It goes pew pew!!!
* New seasonal head: Astro Helmet!

It's GALACTIC Season!
* New vehicle: "Quad-Fin Fighter" - It goes pew pew!!!
* New seasonal head: Astro Helmet!

It's MAJESTIC SEASON!
* New vehicle: The Royal Highness double-decker bus!
* New seasonal Bobby Helmet

It's MAJESTIC SEASON!
* New vehicle: The Royal Highness double-decker bus!
* New seasonal Bobby Helmet

It's MUSCLE SEASON!
* New vehicle: The "Banditt" muscle car!
* Seasonal sunglasses and a mighty moustache!

It's MUSCLE SEASON!
* New vehicle: The "Banditt" muscle car!
* Seasonal sunglasses and a mighty moustache!

Let's cut to the chase: It's Donut Season! Experience the relentless pursuit of justice!
* A new level bundle "Law and Disorder" with four new levels: The City Heights, Highway Patrol, Hornets' Nest and Roadblock Bridge
* A new FREE level: The Getaway
* Performance improvements and fixes

Let's cut to the chase: It's Donut Season! Experience the relentless pursuit of justice!
* A new level bundle "Law and Disorder" with four new levels: The City Heights, Highway Patrol, Hornets' Nest and Roadblock Bridge
* A new FREE level: The Getaway
* Performance improvements and fixes

Stick 'em up! It's... Deputy Season!
* New FREE vehicle: Sweet Justice cop car!
* New seasonal head: Intimidating Cop Hat!
* Bug fixes

Stick 'em up! It's... Deputy Season!
* New FREE vehicle: Sweet Justice cop car!
* New seasonal head: Intimidating Cop Hat!
* Bug fixes

* Quick fix for unwanted Everyplay pop-up message when starting game
* Cop light fixes in replay

* Quick fix for unwanted Everyplay pop-up message when starting game
* Cop light fixes in replay

Have your gadgets ready, it's... Spy Season!
* New FREE vehicle: Espionager!
* New seasonal head: Vintage Agent hat!

Have your gadgets ready, it's... Spy Season!
* New FREE vehicle: Espionager!
* New seasonal head: Vintage Agent hat!
Patch release for audio related stutters and hang-ups.
Patch release for audio related stutters and hang-ups.

It's Chill-out Season!
* All seasonal heads now in the character screen! ALL!
* New totally lazy couch: "Pivot"
* The chillest hat ever: "The Quencher"

Happy holidays everyone!

It's Chill-out Season!
* All seasonal heads now in the character screen! ALL!
* New totally lazy couch: "Pivot"
* The chillest hat ever: "The Quencher"

Happy holidays everyone!

A blast from the past! It's Vintage Season!
* A new classic vehicle: "Magnum"!
* A new hat for daring maneuvers: "The Aviator"!

A blast from the past! It's Vintage Season!
* A new classic vehicle: "Magnum"!
* A new hat for daring maneuvers: "The Aviator"!

Hold on to your barrels, it's... HEAVY SEASON!
* New free vehicle: The Jugger tank!
* Complimentary padded hat: The Weenie
* Minor fixes

Hold on to your barrels, it's... HEAVY SEASON!
* New free vehicle: The Jugger tank!
* Complimentary padded hat: The Weenie
* Minor fixes

Get your locomotion going, it's... RAIL SEASON!
* New FREE vehicle: LOCO!
* Trainee hat included!
* Fixes and improvements.

Get your locomotion going, it's... RAIL SEASON!
* New FREE vehicle: LOCO!
* Trainee hat included!
* Fixes and improvements.

Dig deep, it's... Underground Season!
* New FREE vehicle: Old Creaky!
* Forty-niner helmet included!

Dig deep, it's... Underground Season!
* New FREE vehicle: Old Creaky!
* Forty-niner helmet included!

Celebrating the 100th birthday of Finland with a mythological update!
* A new free vehicle: "Kantele", made from the jawbone of a giant pike!
* A new hat: The "Vaeinaemoeinen", wear it and sing others into swamp!

Unleash your inner Finn!

Celebrating the 100th birthday of Finland with a mythological update!
* A new free vehicle: "Kantele", made from the jawbone of a giant pike!
* A new hat: The "Vaeinaemoeinen", wear it and sing others into swamp!

Unleash your inner Finn!

Start you sirens, it's... EMERGENCY SEASON!
* New FREE vehicle: Lance!
* New headgear included: The Choker
* Supports the new high-resolution screen on the iPhone Xs Max
* Sad news: Everyplay online service will be gone after October 1st 2018. :(
* Good news: This version grants you access to the raw recorded video files, and you can store them to Photos or share them via the default iOS sharing mechanisms.

Get ready to dodge, it's... Bumpy Season!
* New FREE vehicle: Whiplash!
* New hat: The Propeller!
* Preliminary iPhone X support

Happy Holidays - It's Golden Season!
* A new FREE obstacle: "LOOT BOX!"

Place any amount in any level!
Crash into as many as you like!
No extra charge!

Tide's up! It's... BEACH SEASON!
* New FREE vehicle: Jamboree!
* New hat: The Stranger
* Improved UI for iPhone X
* Privacy matters dutifully obliged to. See our updated privacy policy on the store page.
